questions.questionTitle: What problem does the man have?
anwers: He needs to write a report.
He has to go to the fourth floor.

questions.questionTitle: What does the woman say about the copy machine?
anwers: It does not have enough ink.

questions.questionTitle: What does the woman suggest the man do?

script:
� Colleen! The copy machine is down again.
� What's the problem this time? Let's see. It has paper. It's not jammed. It has enough ink. Oh, it needs new toner.
� Great. I have to make 20 copies of this report for a 1 p.m. presentation! Should I use the one on the fourth floor?
� No, this won't take long to fix. Go to the supply room, and the toner is in the bottom left-hand cupboard.
